text: Zvirokwazvo, Qaaroon (Korah) aiva mumwe wevanhu vaMusa, asi aiva achizvitutumadza kwavari. Uye takamupa hupfumi, svumbunuro dzacho dzaitoremera varume vakagwinya. Rangarira apo vanhu vake vakati kwaari: “Usafare (nehupfumi usingatendi Allah). Zvirokwazvo, Allah havadi avo vanofara (nehupfumi vasingatendi Allah).”
